name: Accordion
description: An accessible way for the user to expand and collapse content.

single.title: single
single.description: Set to false to allow only multi section to be open at a time.

collapsible.title: collapsible
collapsible.description: Set to false to disable collapsing of sections.

disableOptionalArrowKeys.title: disableOptionalArrowKeys
disableOptionalArrowKeys.description: Set to true to disable the use of the arrow keys to navigate between sections.

indexes.title: indexes
indexes.description: An array of indexes of the sections that are open by default. This prop allows creating a controlled component and must be used with the onChange event.

defaultIndexes.title: defaultIndexes
defaultIndexes.description: An array of indexes of the sections that are open by default. This prop allows creating an uncontrolled component.

children.title: children
children.description: Element shown as Accordion. As default, Accordion accepts AccordionHeader and AccordionContent as children.

as.title: as
as.description: Changes html tag of accordion component which renders to DOM

onChange.title: onChange
onChange.description: A callback function that is called when a section is opened or closed. This event must be used with the indexes prop to create a controlled accordion.

as.title: as
as.description: Changes html tag of accordion header component which renders to DOM

children.title: children
children.description: Element shown as Accordion Header. As default, Accordion Header accepts AccordionButton as children.

as.title: as
as.description: Changes html tag of Accordion Content component which renders to DOM

children.title: children
children.description: Element shown as Accordion Content. As default, Accordion Content accepts ReactNode as children.

as.title: as
as.description: Changes html tag of accordion button component which renders to DOM
